verbs.description: [ARG0: philadelphia] [V: revamps] [ARG1: sexual harassment prevention policies for city employees] mayor jim kenney and city controller rebecca rhynhart announced at a joint press conference thursday a new executive order outlining updates in the city sexual harassment policies updated sexual harassment training methods for city employees and a modified process for filing complaints featuring a new online portal jane slusser jewell williams philadelphia mayor jim kenney sexual harassment mayors office of labor relations facebook citywide sexual harassment prevention committee rebecca rhynhart harassment
